name: Overview
description: Show all events grouped by the origin host
query: * | table event.dataset event.module event.category observer.name source.ip destination.ip

name: Elastalerts
query: _type:elastalert | table rule.name

name: Alerts
query: event.dataset: alert | table event.module rule.name event.severity source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: NIDS Alerts
query: event.category: network AND event.dataset: alert | table rule.category rule.gid rule.uuid rule.name source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Wazuh/OSSEC
query: event.module:ossec | table rule.category rule.uuid rule.name agent.id agent.name log.full

name: Sysmon
query: event.module:sysmon | table event.dataset user.name.keyword

name: Strelka
query: event.module:strelka | table file.mime_type file.name file.source

name: Zeek Notice
query: event.dataset:notice | table notice.note notice.message notice.sub_message source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Connections
query: event.dataset:conn | table source.ip destination.ip destination.port network.protocol network.transport connection.history connection.state connection.state_description source.geo.country_name destination.geo.country_name

name: DCE_RPC
query: event.dataset:dce_rpc | table dce_rpc.operation dce_rpc.endpoint dce_rpc.named_pipe source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: DHCP
query: event.dataset:dhcp | table host.hostname host.domain dhcp.message_types client.address server.address

name: DNP3
query: event.dataset:dnp3 | table dnp3.fc_request dnp3.fc_reply dnp3.iin source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: DNS
query: event.dataset:dns | table dns.query.name dns.query.type_name dns.response.code_name source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: DPD
query: event.dataset:dpd | table error.reason source.ip destination.ip destination.port network.protocol

name: Files
query: event.dataset:file | table file.mime_type file.source file.bytes.total source.ip destination.ip

name: FTP
query: event.dataset:ftp | table ftp.command ftp.argument ftp.user source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: HTTP
query: event.dataset:http | table http.method http.status_code http.status_message http.useragent http.virtual_host http.uri source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Intel
query: event.dataset:intel | table intel.indicator.keyword

name: IRC
query: event.dataset:irc | table irc.command.type irc.username irc.nickname irc.command.value irc.command.info source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: KERBEROS
query: event.dataset:kerberos | table kerberos.service kerberos.client kerberos.request_type source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: MODBUS
query: event.dataset:modbus | table modbus.function source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: MYSQL
query: event.dataset:mysql | table mysql.command mysql.argument mysql.success mysql.response mysql.rows source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: NOTICE
query: event.dataset:notice | table notice.note notice.message notice.sub_message source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: NTLM
query: event.dataset:ntlm | table ntlm.server.dns.name ntlm.server.nb.name ntlm.server.tree.name ntlm.success source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Osquery Live Queries
query: event.dataset:live_query | table host.hostname

name: PE
query: event.dataset:pe | table file.machine file.os file.subsystem file.section_names file.is_exe file.is_64bit

name: RADIUS
query: event.dataset:radius | table user.name.keyword source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: RDP
query: event.dataset:rdp | table client.name source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: RFB
query: event.dataset:rfb | table rfb.desktop.name.keyword source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Signatures
query: event.dataset:signatures | table signature_id

name: SIP
query: event.dataset:sip | table client.user_agent sip.method sip.uri source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: SMB_Files
query: event.dataset:smb_files | table file.action file.path file.name source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: SMB_Mapping
query: event.dataset:smb_mapping | table smb.share_type smb.path smb.service source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: SMTP
query: event.dataset:smtp | table smtp.from smtp.recipient_to smtp.subject source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: SNMP
query: event.dataset:snmp | table snmp.community snmp.version source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Software
description: List of software seen on the network by Zeek
query: event.dataset:software | table software.type software.name

name: SSH
query: event.dataset:ssh | table ssh.client ssh.server ssh.direction ssh.version ssh.hassh_version source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: SSL
query: event.dataset:ssl | table ssl.version ssl.validation_status ssl.server_name ssl.certificate.issuer ssl.certificate.subject source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: SYSLOG
query: event.dataset:syslog | table syslog.severity_label syslog.facility_label network.protocol source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Tunnel
query: event.dataset:tunnel | table tunnel.type event.action source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: Weird
description: Weird network traffic seen by Zeek
query: event.dataset:weird | table weird.name weird.additional_info source.ip destination.ip destination.port

name: x509
query: event.dataset:x509 | table x509.certificate.key.length x509.san_dns x509.certificate.key.type x509.certificate.subject x509.certificate.issuer

name: Firewall
query: event.dataset:firewall | table rule.action source.ip destination.ip destination.port
